    • Constructor Detail

      • Connect

        public Connect(@Nonnull
               java.lang.String url,
               @Nonnull
               java.lang.String privateKey,
               @Nonnull
               java.lang.String serverCert,
               @Nonnull
               java.lang.String clientCert,
               int timeout,
               boolean debug)
        Constructor to set relevant parameters and add security provider
        Parameters:
        url - URL of the server where to connect
        privateKey - Private key of the user
        serverCert - Certificate of the server where to connect
        clientCert - Certificate to connect to the server and it should trust
        timeout - Time for connection timeout in milli seconds
        debug - If debug is set to true debug information will be print out. Otherwise it will not print debug information.

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        @Nullable
public java.net.URLConnection getConnection()
                                               throws java.security.KeyManagementException,
                                                      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                      java.io.IOException
        Get a connection object. This will create key manager, trust manager, socket factory and set timeout.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.security.KeyManagementException - If SSLContext can not be initialized
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - If no provider supports a TrustManagerFactorySpi implementation for the specified protocol
        java.io.IOException - If the string specifies an unknown protocol or if an I/O exception occurs
